text: Ludemar Pereira Barros, known as Ludemar (born 1 June 1979) is a former Brazilian football player. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Belenenses on 25 August 2002 in a game against Porto. ==References== ==External links== Category:1979 births Category:People from Goiás Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Rio Branco Esporte Clube players Category:Rio Branco Football Club players Category:Clube Náutico Capibaribe players Category:C.F. title: Ludemar
